title: "Is BBVA's shutdown of Simple a bad sign for bank-fintech mergers?"
excerpt: "Many loyal Simple customers have complained about the recent decision by BBVA USA to close the fintech seven years after buying it. The lingering business and cultural challenges that led to the move underscore the long odds against making such combinations work."
